thread.section_title: Roger Smith Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Birthday Visit
thread.title_full: Great Birthday Visit - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Gordon G
title: Great Birthday Visit
text:
My wife arranged a quick surprise visit to NYC for dinner and a broadway show for my birthday. Upon arriving and being asked the reason for our visit, we were upgraded to a great two bedroom corner suite with living/dining room, fireplace (not working, but we did'nt expect it to), kitchenette and two bedrooms. The building seems to be an old apartment building, and they did a great job placing the rooms. I believe our room was the original format. The other couple that we were with had a great room as well.
Great building, location, art, bar and employees. Would definitely reccomend to others.
